StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetOSONa.onalTicketList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
DECLARE @O.cerFY INT
SET @O.cerFY = dbo.GetFYO.cers(GETDATE())
CREATE TABLE #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST (RECRUITER_ID INT NULL, ORG_ID INT NULL, RECRUITER_NAME VARCHAR(100) NULL, OSS VARCHAR(50) NULL, NUMBER_OF_CONTRACTS INT NULL)
SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST (RECRUITER_ID, ORG_ID, RECRUITER_NAME, OSS) SELECT RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID, RP.ORGANIZATION_ID, LTRIM(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE)) + CASE WHEN LEN(RP.RANK_CODE) > 0 THEN SPACE(1) ELSE SPACE(0) END + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LAST_NAME)) + ', ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.FIRST_NAME)) + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + LTRIM(RTRIM(P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME)), SPACE(0)) AS RECRUITER_NAME, LTRIM(RTRIM(OSS.NAME)) + ', ' + LTRIM(RTRIM(OSS.STATE_CODE)) AS OSS FROM RECRUITING_PERSON RP INNER JOIN PERSON P ON (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = P.PERSON_ID AND RP.TOUR_END_DATE IS NULL AND RP.RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = 'O') INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION OSS ON (RP.ORGANIZATION_ID = OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID AND OSS.ORGANIZATION_TYPE = 'OSS' AND OSS.ISOPEN = 'Y')
--- COUNT THE NUMBER OF CONTRACTS FOR EACH OSO UPDATE #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST SET NUMBER_OF_CONTRACTS = (SELECT COUNT(C.CONTRACT_ID) FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA N ON (C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND N.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID = L.RECRUITER_ID AND N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = L.ORG_ID) INNER JOIN OCS O ON (N.NWA_ID = O.NWA_ID AND O.OCS_ID = MCRISS.dbo.GetMaxOCSID(N.NWA_ID, null)) INNER JOIN OCS_CLASS OC ON (O.OCS_CLASS_ID = OC.CLASS_ID AND OC.FISCAL_YEAR = @O.cerFY AND OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE != 'PLCSR') INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = MCRISS.dbo.GetMaxStatusID(N.NWA_ID) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS CS1 WHERE CS1.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS1.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS1.STATUS_CODE = 'B' AND CS1.DISPOSITION_CODE = 'R'))) FROM #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST L
--- RETURN THE DATA SELECT RECRUITER_NAME, OSS, NUMBER_OF_CONTRACTS FROM #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST ORDER BY NUMBER_OF_CONTRACTS DESC
--- CLEAN UP DROP TABLE #OSO_NATIONAL_TICKET_LIST SET NOCOUNT OFF
